nodes.text: A bouf rat was a type of rodent that was preyed upon by a lyxine. While waiting to inform the Sith Lord Darth Vader that the crew of the Executor-class Star Dreadnought and flagship of the elite Imperial fleet Death Squadron, the Executor, had located the YT-1300 light freighter, the Millennium Falcon, newly-made Admiral Firmus Piett compared himself to a lyxine watching a bouf rat as he detailed how he had risen through the ranks of the Imperial Navy.
The bouf rat was mentioned in the short story "For the Last Time," written by Beth Revis and published in 2020 as part of the anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
